column4: My maximum resolution is 640x480 but it should be 1024x786
Can anyone help me correctly install video and audio drivers?
There is a driver on add/remove but last time it broke everything
I just kept getting "signal over range"
I have one of those pos's , could you put a copy of your /var/log/Xorg.0.log on http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org
it's probably a horiz & vert refresh issue for the monitor
gedit /var/log/Xorg.0.log will open it read only
for some reason you are running the vesa driver; try sudo dpkg-reconfigure -phigh xserver-xorg , and choose ati for the driver
you also chose the ati driver?
darn reconfigure has been altered since I last ran it; try logging out, hit ctl-alt-backspace, log back in. We'll go from there
might well do so. If so, we'll try altering the xorg.conf by hand just a tiny bit
np, I'll be working at my desk for a bit
